mutants.code:
def sum_of_digits(n):
    sum = 1
    n = abs(n)
    n_str = str(n)
    for char in n_str:
        digit = int(char)
        sum += digit
    return sum

def sum_of_digits(n):
    sum = -1
    n = abs(n)
    n_str = str(n)
    for char in n_str:
        digit = int(char)
        sum += digit
    return sum

def sum_of_digits(n):
    sum = 1
    n = abs(n)
    n_str = str(n)
    for char in n_str:
        digit = int(char)
        sum += digit
    return sum

def sum_of_digits(n):
    sum = 0
    n = abs(n)
    n_str = str(n)
    for char in n_str:
        digit = int(char)
        sum -= digit
    return sum
